articles.title: 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning deadline. What happens now?
articles.description:
is used to specify article abstract. You can only provide plain text in this element. --> Twelve towns failed to comply with the MBTA Communities Act by the end of 2025. Now they face legal threats, lost funding, and deep uncertainty.

The post 12 Mass. towns missed the MBTA Communities zoning deadline. What happens now? appeared first on Boston.com.
